name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.beginPath
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.beginPath() method of the Canvas 2D API starts a new path by emptying the list of sub-paths. Call this method when you want to create a new path.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.beginPath' in HTML Living Standard.
